summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 56th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest; West 57th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest; West 58th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 24th Avenue Northwest; 22nd Avenue Northwest from Market Street to West 65th Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6214, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
